website_summaries.verdict: An affordable work jacket made of cotton and nylon rather than leather. It suffices in some work conditions, but consider the material before tackling a job.
pros: Lightweight and cooler than some other welding jackets
cons: Because it is not made of leather, it is not as resistant to heat as some other welding jackets

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good protection, significantly lighter/cooler than full leathers
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for table and position MIG GMAW. The only times I've really burned through it or gotten a sting is when I'm doing overhead welding on a car, which is to be expected. Pros: - Comfortable - Good protection - Lightweight and cool (for a welding jacket) - Inexpensive - Neck collar does a good job keeping molten metal off my neck and back Cons: - Slag and heavy spatter can still sting/burn through (the trade-off of the lighter/cooler weight vs full leathers)
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Excellent welding shirt, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely get at least one size bigger than your normal size...especially if you are going to wear it on top of whatever you are wearing. Not sure why people complaint about this product. It is a very heady duty cotton shirt with some sort of flame resistant chemical added to it...similar to the uniforms military people use overseas. It works perfectly fine. Being a shirt it is meant for regular/light duty; perfect for the occasional/recreational welding project. For crazy heavy duty work, as if you make a living welding professionally everyday, you definitely need an expensive welding jacket made of leather..which this one is not! Highly recommended welding shirt.
customer_reviews.author: 21days

customer_reviews.title: Really nice jacket. Durable and not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Really nice jacket. Durable and not too heavy. Based on other reviews that stated the arms were short or that it fit snug, I opted to buy the XL. I normally wear a size large but the XL fits just right. Do yourself a favor and size up.
customer_reviews.author: Bigbopper95

customer_reviews.title: and I'd probably be complaining about it being poor quality if it was a lighter fabric
customer_reviews.text: Why are these things always so hot?? Other than that, and I'd probably be complaining about it being poor quality if it was a lighter fabric, it does ok. I wish it didn't have the velcro strap at top... so I made that wish come true ;) snip.... now it's not rubbing around so much on the chin. Shows no signs of wear and the snaps are as snappy today as the day I bought it, and I wear it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Swany

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks fine
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and fits ok. I got the extra large because I have long arms but its a bit baggy. Though I don't care because it's not a fashion show when your welding. I do like how the logo is small on it too. Makes it so you don't have a huge stiff piece on it.
customer_reviews.author: IcanJUMPthat

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: These jackets are great! Very comfortable and durable. I prefer these over other brands that have to much stitching or decals all over them that feel strange. There's a pocket inside the jacket you can hold soap stone and other various items. I go threw about 3-4 of these jackets a year fluxcore and carbon arc does take their toll on them. Packing was satisfactory I mean it's just a jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: It's just a little loose on me, which I like. Having my movement restricted annoys me when doing intricate work. The material appears sturdy but not heavy. I like the snaps around the wrists to keep the sleeves from being in the way or catching on something. It's so nice to easily cover/uncover my neck area. I'm just a hobbyist, but whether it's for wheeling, grinding or welding, this is a good addition to my shop.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Foreaker

customer_reviews.title: Has fit well and works well
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional welder - just a garage worker, so take it for what it is worth... I have not used any other welding coats - only sleeves - but I like this jacket. Has worked well in both cold and hot environments. Was welding fence gates this weekend in 97 degree weather. Even though it was hot, I was no hotter than normal. If you are in need of sleeves, I would recommend this one...
customer_reviews.author: CobraXP

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, lightweight, not too warm. About as much protection as a long sleeve cotton shirt though.
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: Quality you’d expect from MILLER
customer_reviews.text: It’s holding up through my certification testing (already completed my flat, horizontal and vertical cert) and regular use daily.. I’m starting my overhead testing and it’ll do while getting me through my certification (in door warehouse in booths). I’ll definitely be using my leather jacket for overhead field work. But it definitely has its place. I will definitely replace it when it’s time. Also can’t beat the customer service from this seller. Quick shipping and great communication. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It appears quality is changing with the times.
customer_reviews.text: Left-Amazon 06/18 & Right-Airgas from 09/17. The stitching pattern and threads per inch is cheaper, velcro is sewn on askew, missing the westex ultra-soft marking from the inside of the fabric. The inside where it wouldn't be exposed to UV the fabric is close but not the correct color or texture, and even the feel of the seam lines are off and bulbous. I contacted Miller they said this seller is an authorized retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job Well
customer_reviews.text: This welding jacket/long sleeve shirt is down right awesome. Was doing a lot of mig welding on my back underneath a car and had no burn through. Great neck protection. Not to heavy, not to light, just right. I am 5'10" and well over 200 lbs and the X-Large is a little big, but I like it that way.
customer_reviews.author: To Many Projects & Not Enough Time

customer_reviews.title: Unsnappable snaps
customer_reviews.text: About half of the snaps are almost impossible to unsnap, to the point where I feel like I'm going to rip them out of the fabric. And are just as tough to resnap. Nice quality control.
customer_reviews.author: br549

customer_reviews.title: Not for E6010 overhead
customer_reviews.text: May be obvious to experienced welders, but do not expect to last in overhead with heavy spark. As soon as I moved to this position with E6010 burned up real bad. Overall it's a good fairly inexpensive coat/jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Hurting

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you from getting burned.  Nice jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice welding jacket. I like the snaps vs. Zippers. The wrist snaps fit perfectly when wearing gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: My shirt size is a large. I ordered an extra large. I’m glad I did, no restricted movement and it will allow me to fit a thick shirt under it in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love it had it a yr its out last any others i bought. I will buy another when this one wears out
customer_reviews.author: Seth Emery

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, much more comfortable than leather welding jackets
customer_reviews.author: Ryan O.

customer_reviews.title: Good Moderate Protective Gear
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable...I Stick & TIG Weld in this & it gives a moderate level of protection in a light weight, breathable garment. Not a replacement for leathers, but if you're doing just about anything but overhead you should be satisfied, I know I am. Good welding!
customer_reviews.author: 300WSMxAF

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jacket, Good Weight
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is well made and fits well. It's not too heavy, but seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ed S

customer_reviews.title: Works well...fits well
customer_reviews.text: It stops small splatter and grinding dust well but overhead globs will burn through
customer_reviews.author: Rp

customer_reviews.title: Durability and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: This welding shirt was exactly what I was looking for. It is durable, yet not bulky or heavy. Good quality at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: t.zwief

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed
customer_reviews.text: It's light and comfortable. Can't give it a 5star on durability because I've only used it once, but it feels strong. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Warner Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits good, Velcro on the neck is nice for protection
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great metal working jacket. Provides protection from sharp metal and welding radiation without being too hot in warm temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: it fits small buy 1to2 sizes large I normally wear ...
customer_reviews.text: it fits small buy 1to2 sizes large I normally wear an extra large that's what I ordered it's the same as my old large
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little smaller then size.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a breathable meterail I like the heavy duty feel of the material as well. Wish it was longer tho bigger sizes don’t seem to change the length
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Works good. I was welding on the ground under a car and the spatter that fell beside me and laid by my arm would burn me but not make holes in the jacket. And it's not too hot either.
customer_reviews.author: J.  Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all types of welding
customer_reviews.text: It fits really nice and allows me to move freely even with all my other welding gear on. The only down side I found was when I washed it the way the directions on the tag told me to it became pretty stiff after the wash and shrunk just a bit to much for my liking. I would suggest just washing it with warm water then just let it air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality jacket
customer_reviews.text: Buy the cheap green one on Amazon. Miller should not have put their name on this low quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light. Easy to move
customer_reviews.text: Nice light jacket, I haven’t burned through it MIG welding or light use of an Oxy/Acetylene torch. If I was overhead stick welding I’d probably go heavier but this works great and takes the abuse off my usual clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Fassler

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love Miller stuff.great jacket,very cool for the hot summer days in the shop.
customer_reviews.author: W. Alden

customer_reviews.title: Comes small, had to return my large for an XL. But still incredible product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just get a size up and shrink it, read the label for recommended water temp so you don't compromise the flame resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Biscuit

customer_reviews.title: Overall, Great. Bigger sparks may burn through.
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket, for the most part. It is comfortable on bigger guys and very lightweight. However i did notice that some sparks would burn through the jacket and burn tiny holes in my work shirt, however they were very minor. Overall, great jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Eudin Galvez

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect, size was just right and does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yesterday, and out it to work today. Soft right out of the box, right fit, and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Lundy

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great value in a good jacket. It's well made and fits good.
customer_reviews.author: David Frazer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son who is in school for welding. He loves this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves his new welding jacket! He tried it out the day after it came. His exact words on it's function "I don't know why I didn't order one of these a long time ago!"
customer_reviews.author: A. Blanken

customer_reviews.title: Thin material
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed at this being billed as a welding jacket when a bit of slag burned through the first time I wore this. Welding jackets should shield from slag; and I am using an older Miller 135. Nothing big like a 220V machine; just household 110V. This is not a welding jacket as it is advertised; it's better suited for grinding.
customer_reviews.author: wakkjobb

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: The neck cover is the best part of this jacket! No more arc burn
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and 4 star fit. Dont care for the fabric though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect And Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This beats the old leather jacket. It's lightweight and perfect for small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: rutbuster1

customer_reviews.title: Welding jacket
customer_reviews.text: A bit thinner material than my last Miller welding jacket. Hopefully it will be a little cooler. Fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Beefydad

customer_reviews.title: ... lot and it is true to size and is great material.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad who welds a lot and it is true to size and is great material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lightweight jacket for welding and I really like this one.
customer_reviews.author: BSummer

customer_reviews.title: Top quality welding shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made with quality material and perfect fit. I'm a 5'11" 220 lb guy and the XL fits like perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Larson

customer_reviews.title: this jacket
customer_reviews.text: is weld proof, i could not weld it to anything
customer_reviews.author: John Blewitt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for light welding
customer_reviews.text: Bought jacket for welding class, love it .Im 5ft 7 weigh 180 fits perfect with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Runs small. I wear an XL but this won't ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs small. I wear an XL but this won't fit over anything heavier than a T-shirt. It's a shirt, not a jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Dick F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is Comfortable and light weight, great for TIG welding and Fabrication.
customer_reviews.author: Jfer87

customer_reviews.title: Very good for price
customer_reviews.text: Light weight very comfortable not very good for over head stick welding not heavy enough
customer_reviews.author: Dionell berger

customer_reviews.title: Nice thin jacket
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket, need it to save my shirts, working fine, well made, and fits great
customer_reviews.author: venturian

customer_reviews.title: Miller Welding Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome, love the fit and collar. Typical Miller quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I almost feel cooler when I have the jacket on. Must be good fabric. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Order a larger size
customer_reviews.text: Durable, a bit on the heavy side. I reccomend buying at least a size bigger
customer_reviews.author: ismael

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but just to make it clear this is more like a heavy weight shirt than a jacket. I'm 6' tall and 230lbs, the XL fit me well and leaves room to move around although if you are doing lots of overhead work it may be a tiny bit short when you have two arms up over your head (depending on the size of your belly). I've done lots of grinding and welding in it and so far I have not managed to burn any holes through it. The snaps are nice quality and the velcro at the top collar is a nice touch. I would definitely buy another and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Nasti

customer_reviews.title: Quality material
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! Quality snap buttons haven’t had a single slag burn through yet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jacket was of good use recommend this to anyone who wants one
customer_reviews.author: Louis J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is a perfect quality so comfortable touch, I hope only that they have XXL size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought this sooner
customer_reviews.text: I have had leathers for a while but I wanted some thing lighter and cooler to Tig weld. The sizing chart was spot on perfect fit price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Green

customer_reviews.title: welding jacket
customer_reviews.text: I have used this item several times and most times I was welding above my head. It worked great, do not know why I had not bought one before this. Jacket is of a heavy material, and is not a shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Welding Jacket
customer_reviews.text: My older welding "duster" is getting pretty beaten up after all these years. The size fits well........the finish is good and is heavy enough to do the job I expect from it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Tanis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for TIG welding would not use it for SMAW...
customer_reviews.author: Pablo G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: Nice feel to it, good fit, like the mandarin style collar. Could use an outside pocket though.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its been almost two years since I bought this bay boy and I still have it. Very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Waleska Caffer

customer_reviews.title: Fits over clothes
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my shirt clean. Quality snaps, pocket on inside so sparks won't get in. Had my name embroidered in white. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lois & Billy Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Husband loves it. Wishes he would have bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Akendall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: comfortable, keeps the sparks and flash off your skin. nice light weight.
customer_reviews.author: James S. Ermerins

customer_reviews.title: It fits, is breathable, and hasn't burned yet.
customer_reviews.text: The jacket fits, and I have long arms. It is light and breathable, I never seem to have a welding job in a cool shaded area.
customer_reviews.author: Cable 900

customer_reviews.title: nice but size chart is way off
customer_reviews.text: Miller stuff seems to run very small,,, keep that in mind,,, i where everything XL but miller clothing and gloves seem to be using the China man size chart. so 2XL and you are good. if you want fashion or if you are an extreme cyclist that likes tight fitting clothing and not to use for working/ welding in it then just get your size..
customer_reviews.author: OVERRULED

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A must have for welding. Get it big so it fits over your clothing.
customer_reviews.author: W. Zowtiak

customer_reviews.title: Coolest welding jacket my husband owns
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband for Christmas along with other welding jackets and supplies. He loves this jacket so much that he hasn’t broken it in welding, but rather takes it off before making sparks and wears something else. I’ll need to buy him another one!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Goulet

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Like it, it's light weight, good quality, got here fast.
customer_reviews.author: Alex gray

customer_reviews.title: excellent jacket, great for light protection
customer_reviews.text: excellent jacket, great for light protection when welding. after a few weeks of heavy fabrication jacket still shows no evidence of spatter burn
customer_reviews.author: metul munky

customer_reviews.title: Great welding jacket !
customer_reviews.text: I'm a production welder and its holding up great after 3 weeks. Plenty of room, and very secure. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Lori A Zikovich

customer_reviews.title: It does fit very well and is comfortable. Pretty sure its just a regular shirt treated ...
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight jacket, I do not think itll protect me from welding slag at all. It does fit very well and is comfortable. Pretty sure its just a regular shirt treated with Fire Resistant chemicals like oilfield FRC clothing. I'll still wear it but just as another work shirt when wrenching in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Don K

customer_reviews.title: great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love the jacket. Very comfortable. I weld 1/16 flux core all day with no problems. Especially like the neck strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these jackets for my son and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these jackets for my son and my husband to use in their welding class... After a couple of weeks of wear the stitching on my son's jacket has come apart in several places.
customer_reviews.author: crissybvw

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my welding class keeps me protected and doesn't restrict my movement whatsoever. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: richard allen cahill

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket
customer_reviews.text: For the price a good jacket for light welding. Wore it for about 2 hours today and felt comfortable didn't get too hot, didn't get in the. Held up to a bit of FCW. No burns as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Jacket fits well and looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gotten to use the jacket yet but it looks and fits good. Will be trying it out soon and will update my review then.
customer_reviews.author: Steven 4 HIM

customer_reviews.title: Decent Welding Shirt/Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought an XL. It is big for me. I think I just lost weight over the past year welding. The neck velcro closure could use more velcro for a tighter fit. I would still recommend the jacket. It is good for summer use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian's Amazon Account

customer_reviews.title: NICE JACKET
customer_reviews.text: I AM USING IT AS A SHIRT. MAYBE BUY 1 SIZE UP IF YOU PLAN ON USING IT OVER ANOTHER SHIRT. QUALITY MILLER GARMENT. DIDN'T CHECK WHERE IT IS MADE BUT I WOULD GUESS (HOPE NOT) CHINA.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian Hillbilly

customer_reviews.title: Not a jacket but a shirt
customer_reviews.text: Not a jacket, but a thin shirt. My husband uses it for welding however, he uses it as a shirt and has to put a real jacket over this Miller shirt. It looks good, but no pockets, and I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.K

customer_reviews.title: Disapppointed
customer_reviews.text: The description failed to mention that the manufacturer soaked the jacket in concentrated onion juice. Nasty. Going in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

product_meta.title: Miller Electric 2241909 Welding Jacket, Navy, Cotton/Nylon, XL
product_meta.description: Welding jacket of navy color with a stand-up collar for extra neck protection fits chest size 50" and is of length 30". It has 1 inside pocket and fold-in snaps cuff.
